CSSMask.summary: The mask CSS shorthand property hides an element (partially or fully) by masking or clipping the image at specific points.

blockquote.para: Note: As well as the properties listed below, the mask shorthand also resets mask-border to its initial value. It is therefore recommended to use the mask shorthand rather than other shorthands or the individual properties to override any mask settings earlier in the cascade. This will ensure that mask-border has also been reset to allow the new styles to take effect.
